com.b2international.snowowl.core.api

Interface ILookupService<K extends Serializable,T,V>

  • Type Parameters:
    K - serializable unique identifier of the component
    T - type of the searched component
    V - should be CDO View or its subclass.
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractLookupService, SnomedConceptLookupService, SnomedDescriptionLookupService, SnomedRefSetLookupService, SnomedRefSetMemberLookupService, SnomedRelationshipLookupService

    public interface ILookupService<K extends Serializable,T,V>
    Represents the common service interface for all component lookup services.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean exists(IBranchPath branchPath, K id)
      Returns true if the component exists on a particular branch with the given unique ID.
      IComponent<K> getComponent(IBranchPath branchPath, K id)
      Returns with a lightweight representation of a component identified by the passed in ID.
      T getComponent(K id, V view)
      Returns with a component looked up in the passed in view with the specified unique identifier.
      long getStorageKey(IBranchPath branchPath, K id)
      Returns with the unique storage identifier for a terminology independent specified by the component identifier argument on a given branch.

    • Method Detail

      • getComponent

        T getComponent(K id,
               V view)
        Returns with a component looked up in the passed in view with the specified unique identifier.
        Parameters:
        id - the unique identifier of the component.
        view - the view that stores the state of the component.
        Returns:
        the looked up component. May return with null if no such component exists in that view with the passed in ID.

      • exists

        boolean exists(IBranchPath branchPath,
               K id)
        Returns true if the component exists on a particular branch with the given unique ID.
        Parameters:
        branchPath - the path uniquely identifying the branch where the existence check has to be performed.
        id - the unique ID of the component.
        Returns:
        true if the component exists. Otherwise returns with false.

      • getComponent

        IComponent<K> getComponent(IBranchPath branchPath,
                           K id)
        Returns with a lightweight representation of a component identified by the passed in ID. May return with null if no such component exists in the cached store. In this case clients should call the #getComponent(K, T) method and make sure that searched component is just not cached or does not exists at all. Note: this method is meant to be called on the server side ONLY.
        Parameters:
        id - the unique identifier of the terminology independent component.
        Returns:
        the lightweight terminology component or null if no such component exists in the cached store.

      • getStorageKey

        long getStorageKey(IBranchPath branchPath,
                   K id)
        Returns with the unique storage identifier for a terminology independent specified by the component identifier argument on a given branch.

        NOTE: May return with -1L. Clients must check the returning storage key.

        Parameters:
        branchPath - the path uniquely identifying the branch where the lookup has to be performed.
        id - the unique identifier of component which storage key should be find.
        Returns:
        the unique storage key of the component.
